title: What Actually Happens At A Tattoo Convention? | UnConventional
description: In this video, Max Fosh attends a tattoo convention to explore what actually happens at these events. He interviews tattoo artists, attendees, and even gets a tattoo himself.
summary: Max Fosh investigates the world of tattoo conventions, from the artists to the attendees.
payoff: The payoff comes from Max's interactions with the diverse range of people at the convention and his willingness to immerse himself in the experience, culminating in him getting a tattoo despite his initial hesitations.
